name: Larkspur Landing South San Francisco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a week's stay at the Larkspur Landing. In more than 30 trips to San Francisco this is the best lodging experience I have had. The hotel is well appointed, well maintained and well managed. The list of amenities is extensive and the staff are all pleasant and helpful. Our one bedroom suite had plenty of room, a complete kitchen, two televisions, DVD player, video game, and every little convenience imaginable. The location is pleasant, in the middle of the bio-tech gulch just north of SFO. Access from the Hwy. 101 freeway is easy yet there is no traffic noise. There is plenty of free parking. This will be our headquarters in the Bay Area from now on.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked our hotel online and read the reviews that were submitted. From that it looked like a good pick. As we were familiar with San Fran we knew that staying outside of the downtown was much cheaper. Well upon arriving we were thrilled with the accomodations. The hotel room/suite has a full kitchenette (no oven just stove top), full size fridge, microwave, dishes even a mini dishwasher. The beds were so comfortable, LARGE Queen size bed with feather/down guilts and pillows. We were near the airport and Highway #101 but noise level was minimal. The breakfast included was more than ample and could be taken to your room with no problem. The Starbucks coffee in your room and coffee, cookies and fruit served all day in the Hotel lobby was very convenient and enjoyable. Having a complimentary laundry and free access to internet was also a plus. What can we say....we were there to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary and felt quite at home. We will book there again when we are in the area! HIghly recommend this hotel for location, price and clean, comfortable accomodations.

aka: Larkspur Landing South San Francisco Hotel South San Francisco
description: Located just off of Highway 101 and eight miles south of San Francisco, The Larkspur Landing South San Francisco Hotel is a mere two miles from the San Francisco International Airport and not far from famous attractions like the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, Fisherman's Wharf, the Museum of Modern Art and the Napa Valley. Guests of this San Francisco Airport Hotel enjoy comfortable accommodations and can choose to stay in four different types of suites: Studio, Executive, Boardroom and Grand Suites. Among the top San Francisco extended stay hotels, the Larkspur Landing will exceed all of your business and vacation needs.
